briefTitle: Study STF115288, a Clinical Confirmation Study of GI148512 in the Treatment of Acne Vulgaris in Japanese Subjects
officialTitle: Study STF115288, a Clinical Confirmation Study of GI148512 (Benzoyl Peroxide 3% Gel) in the Treatment of Acne Vulgaris in Japanese Subjects.- A Multicenter, Randomized, Double-blinded, Vehicle-controlled, Parallel-group Study -
summary: This is a multicenter, randomized, double-blinded, vehicle-controlled, parallel-group study in Japanese subjects with acne vulgaris to demonstrate the efficacy of GI148512 (benzoyl peroxide \[BPO\] 3% gel) when applied once daily for 12 weeks. This study will also evaluate the safety of GI148512 when applied topically once daily for 12 weeks.

primaryOutcome.measure: Absolute Change in Total Lesion Counts From Baseline to Week 12
